author: Mental Outlaw
description:
In this video I discuss how the Police in Columbine Valley Colorado wrongfully accused and tried to charge a woman of package theft because they had records of her driving her car near the street where the theft occurred and a suspect on a security camera that only vaguely resembled the innocent woman.

title: Police use Flock Cameras to Wrongfully Accuse Woman of Theft
